_header: Causer of my joy health and comfort
_description: An acrostic on St Katherine — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC257.First Lines:
Kawser of my goy helthe & ComfordAwlle es in yov my hartes lady
                    dere…
CamTCC257.Last Lines:
…In way of servyse as leyle as y canNeuere to change bot take
                    me for your man
CamTCC257.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 273.
Wilson,  Kenneth George. 
             “Five Fugitive Pieces of Fifteenth-Century Secular Verse.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         69 (1954): 18-22: 21.
